data.eml:eml: Aliocis, a replacement name for the preoccupied ciid genus Anoplocis Kawanabe, 1996 (Coleoptera: Tenebrionoidea: Ciidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sandoval-Gómez, Vivian Eliana, Lopes-Andrade, Cristiano (2015): Aliocis, a replacement name for the preoccupied ciid genus Anoplocis Kawanabe, 1996 (Coleoptera: Tenebrionoidea: Ciidae). Zootaxa 3946 (4): 599-600, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3946.4.11
